{
	"entityView":{
"Name": "AddressDetails",
"DisplayName": "Address Details",
"EntityId": "{{UserId}}",
"Action": "AddAddress",
"ItemId": "",
"Properties": [
{
"Name": "Version",
"DisplayName": "Version",
"Value": "2",
"IsHidden": true,
"OriginalType": "System.Int32",
"IsReadOnly": true,
"IsRequired": true
},
{
"Name": "Country",
"DisplayName": "Country",
"Value": "Canada",
"IsHidden": false,
"OriginalType": "System.String",
"IsReadOnly": true,
"IsRequired": true
},
{
"Name": "AddressName",
"Policies": [
{
"@odata.type": "#Sitecore.Commerce.Core.MaxLengthPolicy",
"PolicyId": "af3a53fe862d4bb190da30b5f9e5b9f7",
"Models": [],
"MaxLengthAllow": 100
}
],
"DisplayName": "Address Name",
"Value": "Home",
"IsHidden": false,
"OriginalType": "System.String",
"IsReadOnly": false,
"IsRequired": true
},
{
"Name": "City",
"Policies": [
{

"Models": [],
"MaxLengthAllow": 100
}
],
"DisplayName": "City",

"IsReadOnly": false,
"IsRequired": true
},
{

},
{
"Name": "State",

"PolicyId": "50cf776c3082414ba7d036e6ff387e23",

{
"Name": "ON",
"DisplayName": "Ontario",
"IsDefault": false
},
{
"Name": "QC",
"DisplayName": "Quebec",
"IsDefault": false
}
],
"AllowMultiSelect": false
}
],
"DisplayName": "State",
"Value": "ON",
"IsHidden": false,
"OriginalType": "System.String",
"IsReadOnly": false,
"UiType": "Dropdown",
"IsRequired": true
},
{

}
],
"DisplayName": "First Name",

"IsRequired": false
},
{

}
],

"IsHidden": false,

"IsRequired": false
},
{

"IsRequired": true
},
{

],

],
